sections.intro-paragraph: Here is where you will find the projects i've been involved in, a mix of personal and student projects.

chapters.heading: Input, Processing, and Output
chapters.description: These exercises provided me with a solid foundation in fundamental programming concepts such as input/output, and processing strings and numbers

chapters.heading: Calculations
chapters.description: Here I covered a range of mathematical operations, such as working with exponents, computing compound interest, and performing calculations on time and dates

chapters.heading: Making Decisions
chapters.description: This chapter is all about making decisions. We learn to deal with if statements, comparisons, and logical operators

chapters.heading: Functions
chapters.description: Encapsulating code into functions is a key part of programming. how to write functions, how to call functions, and how to pass data to functions

chapters.heading: Repetition
chapters.description: Loops, loops, loops. We loop through arrays, we loop through strings, we loop through numbers. We learn to deal with while loops, for loops, and nested loops.

chapters.heading: Data Structures
chapters.description: Learning to work with arrays, lists, and maps. storing and retrieving data, and manipulating data in these structures.

chapters.heading: Working with Files
chapters.description: Here we learn to work with files. We learn to read and write files, and how to parse data from files like JSON and CSV.

chapters.heading: Working with External Services
chapters.description: These exercises help introduce the concept of APIs. We learn to work with APIs, and how to use them to retrieve data from external services.

chapters.heading: Full Programs
chapters.description: These are fully fledged programs that combine, reinforce, and extend the concepts learned in the previous chapters.
